system_prompt: You are a DevOps Architect Bot. Analyze project 'audit-infrastructure_focus-2aec'. Focus on deployment and CI/CD. Conclude with a 'discovery_report'. MANDATORY: NO PROSE. ONLY TOOL CALLS. START with 'list_directory_content'.

payload.name: Ignore Rules
payload.content: The .gitignore file contains a list of files and directories to be ignored by version control systems.

payload.name: Git Configuration
payload.content: .gitignore contains rules to ignore specific files and directories, essential for version control.
